text: Thick-cut crispy pork belly and pork flower. The meat is juicy and the skin is crispy. It is located inside the air-conditioned Kopitiam.
The cuisine is good. However, the server wearing AirPods is not paying attention. He put everything in the take-out pouch even though we ordered dine-in.
Roasted pork belly is so crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside. They gave us 2 chillis to bite on too! Love it.
Food is very nice with very generous portion. Often get the sisig, beef stew and roasted pork belly here. The only downside is the extremely long queues especially during peak hours
I ordered only the curry without rice, but they charged the same price — such a terrible shop. I’m never coming back here again..
